sentence: just like every W hotel the service and comfort of the hotel was great
The bar scene is a happening place with fast attentive service
The staff at the front desk was nice
So the W insider Sara Hamza reaches out before our stay just to make sure we are in the know and have plans set
From check in to check out I had a great experience hotel staff was there when you needed them and not in your face when you did not
Really nice staff complimentary car service in the city limit is saved on uber taxi rate included breakfast which was amazing
The staff was extremely friendly and attentive
The staff here is absolutely the most friendly I have ever encountered
The service was top notch the set up professional and condusive to networking
The staff at the reception offered to “ upgrade ” us to a better room with one bigger sized bed plus a movable mattress bed
But they expect you to stay at the hotel with less or NO service at all
Place was nice but they need to negotiate w their employees and end strike
Terrible on straik no service very poor
W dismissed the claim saying the attendants word was that they replenished a bottle of bourbon is held in higher regard than the customers and refused to reverse the charge
Hair dryer blown with cold air staff replaced it with 100 non working one and only third attempt was successful
Their policy is all about making money with zero customer service PS 1
This hotel is overpriced for the services given
There is a small hallway alcove on the 3rd floor right next to the staff toilets with two mostly broken printers no office accoutrements and rickety computers you can not print from your own laptop
The front desk staff is not that friendly

He would not let me stand at the front desk even though I arrived for breakfast a couple minutes early which I did not know he is always got a warm smile for everyone and he is got the gift to magically make even the grumpies jetlaged guest me feel happy and smile
They were not active listening and their stern faces made it uncomfortable to talk to them especially two Asian males service representatives at the front desk

The cons Our toilet did not work very well wifi was not free room service kept forgetting stuff and had to go back and forth a few times before we got everything we ordered and took a few flushes before toilet would finally flush
Despite the fact that I had employee discount and did n’t know anyone at this hotel
